title: Cognition: Game of the Year Edition (2.1.0.9) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Run "setup_cognition_episode1_goty_2.1.0.9"
2. Run "setup_cognition_episode2_goty_2.1.0.9"
3. Run "setup_cognition_episode3_goty_2.1.0.9"
4. Run "setup_cognition_episode4_goty_2.1.0.9"
5. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: COGNITION: GAME OF THE YEAR EDITION
Genre: Adventure - Point-and-click - Detective-mystery
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) 
Languages: Audio and text: English. Text only: Deutsch, italiano
Modes: Single-player
Released: October 30, 2012
Size: 3.3 GB
Company: Phoenix Online Studios / Phoenix Online Studios
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/cognition_an_erica_reed_thriller

About:
